servinfo.title: Parking Brake Cable Removal and Installation

attention3.ptxt: When it is necessary to remove both right and left parking brake cables, repeat the following steps 4) to 6) on right and left wheels.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect parking brake cable from equalizer (parking brake lever) and clamps.
Remove brake drum. Refer to Rear Brake Drum Removal and Installation:Drum .
Disconnect parking brake cable from brake shoe lever referring to Rear Brake Shoe Removal and Installation:Drum .
Remove parking brake cable and parking cable bracket.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Install it by reversing removal procedure, noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Install clamps properly referring to Parking Brake Cable Location:Drum .
Tighten bolts and nuts to specified torque referring to Parking Brake Cable Location:Drum .
Adjust parking brake cable. Refer to Parking Brake Inspection and Adjustment:Drum .
Check brake drum for dragging and brake system for proper performance. Brake test should be performed.
